name: Dig Dug Re-Arrangement
description:
A clone of Dig Dug but without the ability to use the pump. Instead, the player must use the other standard method: crushing enemies with rocks. To support this, the rocks can be carried, as well as thrown  if you have enough momentum.

Current Issues

  • The text for ending a level, either by winning or losing, does not appear, and as a result you cannot move onto the next level. This problem is not present when running the game in Unity itself.
  • On occasion, some enemies will be counted twice when crushed, allowing the level to be completed without killing every enemy.
  • Resetting the level will result in the first issue, even in Unity, albeit only with trying to win a level. Losing works just fine.
